actions.lostDescription: Report your lost item and get notified when someone finds it. Our community is here to help!
actions.foundDescription: Help a fellow community member by reporting what you found. Make someone's day better!

trust.securitySubtitle: Your security and privacy are our top priorities
trust.secureDescription: All interactions are secure and your personal information is protected.
trust.verifiedDescription: Only verified organization members can post and claim items.
trust.supportDescription: Professional support and security available around the clock.

contact.joinThousands: Join thousands of organizations using our trusted platform

legal.privacyIntro: Public Sector Lost & Found Management SaaS Platform ('we', 'us', or 'our') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our lost and found service.
legal.termsIntro: By accessing and using the Public Sector Lost & Found Management SaaS Platform, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

itemInfo.location: Location where item was lost or found
itemInfo.photos: Photos of lost or found items

useInfo.facilitate: Facilitate the return of lost items to their owners
useInfo.communicate: Communicate between users about lost and found items
useInfo.security: Ensure platform security and prevent fraud
useInfo.comply: Comply with legal obligations and university policies

legal.sharingPolicy: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

sharing.legal: To comply with legal obligations or court orders
sharing.safety: To protect the safety and security of users
sharing.university: With university administration for policy enforcement

legal.securityMeasures: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information:

security.encryption: Data encryption in transit and at rest

rights.access: Access your personal data we hold
rights.object: Object to processing of your data

legal.policyChanges: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.
legal.termsChanges: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

eligible.staff: Faculty and staff members of public institutions
eligible.age: Must be at least 18 years old or have parental consent

may.report: Report lost or found items honestly and accurately
may.contact: Contact other users about items through the platform
may.claim: Claim items that belong to you with proper verification

mayNot.false: Post false, misleading, or fraudulent information
mayNot.inappropriate: Post inappropriate, offensive, or harmful content
mayNot.impersonate: Impersonate others or create fake accounts
mayNot.illegal: Use the platform for illegal activities
mayNot.interfere: Interfere with the platform's operation or security

legal.contentOwnership: You retain ownership of content you post. By posting content, you grant us a license to use, display, and distribute it on the platform for the purpose of operating the service.
legal.platformOwnership: The platform, its design, features, and functionality are owned by Public Sector Lost & Found Platform and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
legal.dataProtectionInfo: Your use of this platform is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these terms by reference. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand our data collection and use practices.

safety.meetPublic: Always meet in public, well-lit areas
safety.bringFriend: Consider bringing a friend when meeting someone
safety.trustInstinct: Trust your instincts - if something feels wrong, leave
safety.reportSuspicious: Report suspicious activity to security immediately

disclaimer.noGuarantee: We do not guarantee the accuracy of user-posted information
disclaimer.userResponsibility: Users are responsible for verifying item ownership and authenticity
disclaimer.noLiability: We are not liable for disputes between users or lost/stolen items
disclaimer.asIs: The service is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind

legal.liabilityLimit: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Public Sector Lost & Found Platform shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from your use of the platform.
legal.terminationPolicy: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to the service at our sole discretion, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.
legal.ethiopianLaw: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Ethiopia. Any disputes arising under these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Ethiopia.

cta.joinCommunity: Join thousands of members and staff using our trusted platform

footer.copyright: ¬© 2024 Public Sector Lost & Found Platform. All rights reserved.

welcome.postItems: Post items you've lost or found
welcome.contactOwners: Contact owners securely through our platform
